main.title: TT_Please connect to NodeCore
message.text.1:
TT_Please first connect to NodeCore.
You can download NodeCore from Github:
message.text.3:
TT_You can change the IP and Port in the properties file.
For further questions, join the community at:
message.text.3a: TT_You can change the IP and Port in the properties file.
label.lblConnectToNC: TT_Please first connect to NodeCore. This could be a local or remote instance.
label.lblPropFile: TT_Make sure the address, port, and (optional) password in the properties file are correct:
label.lblMessageCommunity: TT_For further questions, join the community at:
label.lblbtnNodeCoreStart: TT_I already have NodeCore on this machine and want to start it
label.lblbtnNodeCoreInstall: TT_I do not yet have NodeCore and want to open a webpage with install instructions
label.lblbtnNodeCoreReconnect: TT_NodeCore is already running, I changed a connection property and want to try reconnecting
label.minNCVersion: TT_This requires at least NodeCore version %1$s or higher.
onloadErrorPassword: TT_Missing or Invalid Password. Please modify the properties file (%1$s) and add a new key for the password to match what is in the nodecore.properties file: %2$s, and click the 'Reconnect to NodeCore' button.
onloadErrorUnavailable: TT_NodeCore not available at %1$s. Please either start NodeCore or modify the properties file (%2$s) and click the 'Reconnect to NodeCore' button.
startAreYouSure:
TT_Are you sure that you want to start a new instance of NodeCore (there should be only one instance running).
If NodeCore is already started then don't start a second instance.
startAreYouSure_cancel: TT_Action cancelled - new instance of NodeCore not started
startPickFolder: TT_Pick the 'bin' folder containing NodeCore startup scripts (like nodecore or nodecore.bat)
startNoFolder: TT_No folder selected, did not start NodeCore
startSuccess:
TT_Successfully started NodeCore as a new process. Running from: %1$s.
Please note that NodeCore may take several minutes to load before you can connect to it!
